name: uncensored
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An uncensored book, film, document, etc. has not been censored (= had parts removed because it is considered offensive or harmful): An uncensored version of the video was soon circulating online. His comments went out live and uncensored on national TV.
More examplesFewer examplesThey claim to have access to the uncensored official documents.During those years, he sought to get his hands on uncensored foreign newspapers and books.The unedited and uncensored nature of user-generated content can be a double-edged sword.
